typelike.core¶

Classes¶

AnyLike()

Anything is AnyLike

Anything

alias of typelike.core.any.AnyLike

ListLike()

Something that is ListLike is something that can be coerced into a 1-dimensional list.

NumberLike()

Something that is NumberLike is something that is singular and numerical

Functions¶
